title: Login Problems?
body:
Hey guys,

Since the most recent update I have not been able to login at all. I can launch the game and then after I enter my login details, its loads, comes up with 'logging in' for about 40 seconds until and error code pops up telling me I cant connect to the PVP network. After that it automatically closes league. Is this just me or are other people experiencing this?

replies.body: Foxtel ISP and I am in Nambour, Sunshine coast

I'm using the same ISP, I've tried every fix I can find so I'm starting to think it's on their end.
Did you manage to get logged in?
I also tried the DNS solution but it had no affect. I am still unable to login sadly
Per my other response - What ISP do you use and which city are you in?
I'm having the same issue, it was fine until I patched this morning. I just tried the DNS suggestion too, still can't log in unfortunately.

Hey,

I've heard a couple of isolated reports of this issue today - Where are you playing from?  What ISP do you use?

This was reported by another player in Help & Support earlier today, and he was able to solve it thanks to a [suggestion from SephirothSG](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/lYxuY7JV-having-trouble-logging-in?comment=00010000) to change his DNS.

Let me know if that works for you.

Cheers
Mindstar
